phrase.text: Hey. Listen, I need a bit of help here.
Basically, I had an argument with another stalker… Doesn’t matter what it was about. And he took something from me… My eye… Thankfully, it was a glass eye.
I don’t have time for that.
Hi. Look here. Is this the right guy?
I think you have something that doesn’t belong to you.
Hey, calm down, man… Fine. Take it. I don’t need more crap right now.
Okay. Go already. If it wasn’t for Duty, this conversation would be different. Trust me.
Great work, Messer. Here’s your hard-earned money.
